member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As License = New License license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic") Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Licenses the component.
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.License.IsLicensed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether product is licensed.
member.value: true if product is licensed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.Metered
member.summary: Provides methods to set metered key.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to set metered public and private key
[C#]
Metered matered = new Metered(); matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey");
[Visual Basic]
Dim matered As Metered = New Metered matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey")

member.summary: Sets metered public and private key

member.name: P:Aspose.OMR.OmrConfig.FillThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the threshold percentage of black pixels in the area to consider it filled. The value is in range [0;1], with 1 corresponding to 100% of pixels in area must be black to consider it filled.

member.summary: Creates instance of from a stream. This will raise an exception if files for that language are not correct.
member.exception: Thrown when language is not supported.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer
member.summary:
A container for recognition languages.
Recognition of multiple languages. The text is recognized by words. Each recognized word has a specific language. There is a priority in recognition languages. Language that was added earlier to the collection has a higher priority. If the word is identical in several languages, a language that was earlier added to the collection will be selected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.AddLanguage(Aspose.OCR.ILanguage)
member.summary: Adds a language to language container. If such language is already in the collection, it is added again.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.AddLanguages(Aspose.OCR.ILanguage[])
member.summary: Adds a range of languages to the language container

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.RemoveLanguage(Aspose.OCR.ILanguage)
member.summary: Removes specified language from the container

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.RemoveLanguages(Aspose.OCR.ILanguage[])
member.summary: Removes a range of languages from the container

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.Clear
member.summary: Removes all languages from language container

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.ResetToDefaults
member.summary: Clears all loaded languages and loads the default one

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the container

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.LanguageContainer.Languages
member.summary: Array of all the languages loaded into the language container

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine
member.summary: Main Aspose.OCR class. Users will use instance of this class most of the time. OcrEngine provides methods for image processing, choosing language and recognition process

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.Process
member.summary:
Runs the recognition process.
OcrEngine must be configured before running this method, otherwise Exception will be thrown. Once this method is called, you may get recognized text from Text property. Before calling the method, add at least one language to Languages and set image.
member.returns: A value indicating whether text has been recognized succesfully.
member.exception: Thrown if it instance is not configured.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.AddNotifier(Aspose.OCR.INotifier)
member.summary:
Adds notifier.
Each notifier can send event (recognized word, recognized several characters). You can add many notifiers.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.ClearNotifies
member.summary: Clear notifiers list.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the engine

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.Config
member.summary: Gets or sets configuration.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.Image
member.summary: Sets the picture to recognize the text from. This property must be set before recognition or specified as one of arguments during Process call.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.ProcessAllPages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all frames in image must be processed.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.Pages
member.summary: Gets recognized text divided to pages. This property is only available after recognition is complete, otherwise exception will be raised.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.Text
member.summary: Gets recognized text. This property is only available after recognition is complete, otherwise exception will be raised.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.LanguageContainer
member.summary:
Gets container with recognition languages. Enables user to define a list of languages to use for recognition. You may add several languages here. By default English language is loaded.
Recognition of multiple languages. The text is recognized by words. Each recognized word has a specific language. There is a priority of recognition languages. Language that was added earlier to the collection has a higher priority. If the word is identical in several languages, a language that was earlier added to the collection will be selected.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OcrEngine.PreprocessedImages
member.summary: Containes several modifications of source image, that were obtained during different preprocessing steps

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.AdjustRotationMode
member.summary: Define adjust rotation mode.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AdjustRotationMode.Automatic
member.summary: Automatic detection of rotation.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AdjustRotationMode.UserDefined
member.summary: User defined value of rotation angle. Need set AdjustRotationAngle property.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AdjustRotationMode.Disabled
member.summary: Without rotation.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.AdjustUpsideDownRotationMode
member.summary: Define adjust upsidedown orientation mode.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AdjustUpsideDownRotationMode.Flip
member.summary: Rotate picture to 180 degrees.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AdjustUpsideDownRotationMode.None
member.summary: Without rotation.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.IRecognitionBlock
member.summary:
This interface represents a block.
Block is a rectangular region that may contain text, picture or any other data. OCR Engine will recognize whole image and will try to find text blocks by itself, if blocks are not specified by user.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognitionBlock.BlockId
member.summary: Returns the block's ID. Each block has unique ID. Sets when the block is created.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognitionBlock.Rectangle
member.summary: Returns the rectangle that defines recognition block inside specified image

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognitionBlock.ToRecognize
member.summary: Shows if block needs to be processed by OCR Engine

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognitionBlock.RecognitionData
member.summary: Gets the recognition data.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognitionBlock.Whitelist
T:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedText
member.summary: This interface is for work with recognized text. The result may be in multiple formats (plain text, array parts with details on each, in the hOCR format).

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedText.ToString
member.summary: Gets whole recognized text without formatting. It is concatenation texts from parts.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedText.PartsInfo
member.summary:
Gets an array of recognized text by parts.
Each part has its own style, font, text size, color, language and more. If the text consists of several parts that are written by different font (or a different language, etc.), then according to each will have an element in this array. It is divided by the words into parts, if have large text that has the same style. Parts are consistently followed, that they found in the original text so they are following here.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.INotifier
member.summary: This interface represents a notifier. Each notifier can send event (recognized word, recognized several characters).

member.name: E:Aspose.OCR.INotifier.Elapsed
member.summary: Occurs when the event has raised.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.INotifier.Text
member.summary: Gets the recognized text. This is only part of the recognized text that was processed between the two raisings of events.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedPartInfo
member.summary: Interface that presents information about part of the recognized text. Could be text or detected picture block

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedPartInfo.Box
member.summary: Gets the rectangular area where the detected block (with text or picture) is shown on the image. Coordinates starts with the upper left corner of the image.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo
member.summary:
This interface presents information about each part of the recognized text.
Part of text seems one part, that has all the same characteristics (style, color, etc.). It is divided by the words into parts, if have large text that has the same style.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of this part.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.Italic
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this part is italic.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.TextColor
member.summary: Gets a color of text this part.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets the color of background this part.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.CharactersQuality
member.summary: Gets an array of values specified for some recognition of this character. Size of the array is equal to size of Text (how many letters in part). Each array element can be from 0.0 to 1.0 inclusive. Value 0.0 means that the poorly recognized, 1.0 means that perfectly recognized.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.CharactersBox
member.summary: Gets an array of rectangles. Size of the array is equal to size of Text (how many letters in part). Each rectangle indicates the area of character. Coordinates starts with the upper left corner of the picture.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.Language
member.summary: Gets the language of this part.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.Children
P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.Level
member.summary:
Shows hierarchical level of text part
[C#] IRecognizedTextPartInfo firstLine = (ocr.Text.PartsInfo[0] as IRecognizedTextPartInfo).Children[0]; Console.WriteLine(firstLine.Level); // will be TextPartLevel.Line

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.IRecognizedTextPartInfo.IsTrimmed
member.summary: Indicates whether recognition result was trimmed due to evaluation restrictions

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.NotifierFactory
member.summary: This is factory for creating objects of type "INotifier". It has a set of static methods for creating objects from different input data.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.NotifierFactory.WordNotifier
member.summary: Creates the notifier that causes an event when a word is recognized.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.NotifierFactory.SymbolNotifier
member.summary: Creates the notifier that causes an event on each recognized symbol.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.NotifierFactory.LineNotifier
member.summary: Creates the notifier that causes an event when a text line is recognized.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.NotifierFactory.BlockNotifier
member.summary: Creates the notifier that causes an event when detected text block is recognized.
member.exception: Thrown when blockSize less or equal zero.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.NotifierFactory.PageNotifier
member.summary: Creates the notifier that causes an event when a page of a multipage document is recognized.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.NotifierHandler
member.summary: Delegate for Elapsed event.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig
member.summary: Configuration for OCR system. OCRConfig provides methods for customizing of the image processing and recognition

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.AddRecognitionBlock(Aspose.OCR.IRecognitionBlock)
member.summary: Adds a rectangular block to user defined RecognitionBlocks

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.ClearRecognitionBlocks
member.summary: Clear recognition blocks array.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.ProbabilityRow
member.summary: Gets or sets row with probable symbols to return probable symbols from. Default value is 0, so only the most probable symbols return.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.CorrectionFilters
member.summary: Gets or sets filters for correction before recognition

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.DoSpellingCorrection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether automatic spelling correction should be applied. Use this option to improve OCR result but notice that this will increase total processing time

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.DetectTextRegions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether automatical detection of the regions with text must be used. If this property is set to "true", manually set recognition blocks will be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.RemoveNonText
member.summary: Set this parameter to TRUE if image contains non-text components (e.g. pictures, graphics) that should be detected and ignored during recognition process

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.Whitelist
P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.DeleteTableLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether need to find and delete table lines in document Don't use this property unnecessarily, because it may remove some meaningful information from the image and will increase total processing time

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.DetectReadingOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether special reading order detection operation must be applied to textblocks Default value is TRUE If OCR process works too much time or is not responding, try to set this property to FALSE

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.AdjustRotation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value of adjust rotation mode . Possible values: - skew angle is defined automatically (this may take some time but will improve recognition quality) - image is rotated on angle defined in - no image rotation will be applied

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.AdjustRotationAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value of clockwise rotation angle, in degrees. Use only when AdjustRotation is equal to AdjustRotationMode.UserDefined.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.AdjustUpsideDownRotation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value of upsidedown rotation mode . Set it to if text on image is upsidedown so it will be rotated to 180 degrees

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.ProcessColoredBackground
member.summary: Turn on this option if input image have complex colored background and standart process works bad

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.QuantizationPalleteSize
member.summary: It is advanced option, which control number of colors to image pallete while quantization; this option make sence olny if ProcessColoredBackground is true; defalt value is 5

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.RecognitionBlocks
member.summary: User defined blocks that determines page layout

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.OCRConfig.SavePreprocessedImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether saving of preprocessed images is enabled. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.OcrException
member.summary: This exception indicates an exception while working with OCR module.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OcrException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Create this exception with the given message and underlying cause.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.OcrException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create this exception with the given message.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.PreprocessedImages
member.summary: Containes several modifications of source image, that were obtained during different preprocessing steps

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.PreprocessedImages.BinarizedImage
member.summary: Source image after binarization or background correction. Set Config.SavePreprocessedImages property to true to get image.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.PreprocessedImages.FilteredImage
member.summary: Source image after applying specified Set Config.SavePreprocessedImages property to true to get image.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.PreprocessedImages.RotatedImage
member.summary: Source image after skew correction. Set Config.SavePreprocessedImages property to true to get image.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.PreprocessedImages.NonTextRemovedImage
member.summary: Source image after detecting and removing pictures and other nontext fragments Set Config.SavePreprocessedImages property to true to get image.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.PreprocessedImages.TextBlocksImage
member.summary: This image displays detected text blocks with red rectangles. Set Config.SavePreprocessedImages property to true to get image.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionBlock
member.summary: This factory creates objects of type . This has a set of static methods for creating objects from different input data.

The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

is less than or equal to 0

The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

is less than or equal to 0
